country_event = {
	id = 566777743
	title = "AI: RC"
	desc = "AI: Renaming Check."

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
	name = "Checking..."
	country_event = 566777744
	random_owned = { limit = { owner = {
	NOT = {
	has_global_flag = rename_thirty_days
	has_global_flag = rename_two_months
	has_global_flag = rename_four_months
	has_global_flag = rename_six_months
	} } }
	owner = { CLN = { country_event = { id = 566777743 days = 365 } } } }
	random_owned = { limit = { owner = {
	has_global_flag = rename_thirty_days
	NOT = {
	has_global_flag = rename_two_months
	has_global_flag = rename_four_months
	has_global_flag = rename_six_months
	} } }
	owner = { CLN = { country_event = { id = 566777743 days = 30 } } } }
	random_owned = { limit = { owner = {
	has_global_flag = rename_two_months
	NOT = {
	has_global_flag = rename_thirty_days
	has_global_flag = rename_four_months
	has_global_flag = rename_six_months
	} } }
	owner = { CLN = { country_event = { id = 566777743 days = 61 } } } }
	random_owned = { limit = { owner = {
	has_global_flag = rename_four_months
	NOT = {
	has_global_flag = rename_thirty_days
	has_global_flag = rename_two_months
	has_global_flag = rename_six_months
	} } } owner = { CLN = { country_event = { id = 566777743 days = 122 } } } }
	random_owned = { limit = { owner = {
	has_global_flag = rename_six_months
	NOT = {
	has_global_flag = rename_thirty_days
	has_global_flag = rename_two_months
	has_global_flag = rename_four_months
	} } } owner = { CLN = { country_event = { id = 566777743 days = 183 } } } }
} }
